name: Grilled Pineapple Salsa
description: Become a salsa snob this summerâ€“grilled pineapple is sweet & smoky and perfect for the summer. Pineapple is packed with vitamin C and fibre. Serve alongside Chicken Adobo.

ingredients.name: pineapple
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and cored, sliced into rings

preparation: Brush pineapple with vegetable oil. Sprinkle with Poco Picante Salsa Mix.
Grill pineapple until marks form on both sides, about 2 to 3 minutes per side. Coarsely chop.
Stir with chopped peppers and diced onions and serve.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
